comments.author: EarnOnVictor
comments.body: I've seen reasonable people, especially foreigners defending Nigerians times without a number. These are the people that have been here, so they know what's going on and concluded that Nigerian scams are overexaggerated. Desperation and poverty have pushed many Nigerians into scams, but still, the scams in the country are mainly romance scams. Many Nigerians might be engaging in this which pushes our scam rating high, but the true scammers are foreigners in advanced countries, not Nigerians.We should try not to wash our dirty linen outside, and I know with an improved economy and welfare, all these would subside.
